name: Dragon's Dinner VR
description: Welcome to the latest version of the Dragon's Dinner! This is a VR game, tested with Oculus Quest 2 and Oculus Rift. In this version, players can chop logs to make a fire and cook roast meat to feed the little dragons. As you progress through the game, you'll need to feed the dragons different types of food to help them grow and evolve. Can you keep up with the dragons' appetites and become the ultimate dragon feeder? Play now to find out!
